style_guide.visual_style: Warm, friendly illustrated style with soft colors (pastels, warm yellows, light blues). Modern Korean cafe/street setting with natural lighting. Approachable, cheerful mood with contemporary young adult aesthetic. Clean, inviting atmosphere that feels realistic but slightly stylized.
style_guide.segment_story: A young woman approaches a young man at a cafe, initiating a friendly conversation. She asks about his name, compliments it, inquires about his age and hobbies, and comments on his clothing. The interaction builds to her suggesting they become friends over coffee. Two characters of opposite sex engaging in a getting-to-know-you conversation in a casual cafe environment.

images.prompt_used: A warm, friendly illustrated scene in a modern Korean cafe with soft pastel colors and natural lighting streaming through large windows. A young woman with flowing dark hair wearing a cream cardigan stands nearby a young man with casual styled hair wearing a light blue shirt, both in their twenties. The woman is smiling warmly and leaning slightly forward in a friendly greeting gesture, while the young man sits at a small wooden cafe table with a coffee cup, looking up at her with a pleasant surprised expression. The cafe interior features light wooden furniture, potted plants on shelves, and soft warm yellow sunlight creating a cheerful, inviting atmosphere. Contemporary Korean cafe aesthetic with clean lines, minimal decor, and a cozy ambiance. Both characters are prominently featured in the frame within the same unified space, drawn in a soft, approachable illustrated style with gentle colors and realistic but slightly stylized proportions. Square composition, 1080x1080 pixels.

Medium shot in a modern Korean cafe with soft pastel decor and warm natural lighting. The young woman from the character reference is centered in frame, shown from chest up, with a bright warm smile and sparkling eyes as she speaks. She has one hand gently raised in a friendly conversational gesture near her chest. Her expression is genuinely complimentary and engaging. The young man from the character reference is partially visible in the foreground right side, slightly out of focus, showing the back/side of his head and shoulder, creating an over-the-shoulder perspective. Soft bokeh cafe background with blurred warm lights, pastel walls, and hints of cafe details. Warm golden hour lighting illuminating her face. Shallow depth of field emphasizing her animated, friendly expression. Contemporary young adult aesthetic with approachable, cheerful mood.

Close-up over-the-shoulder shot in a modern Korean cafe with soft pastel walls and warm natural window lighting. Camera positioned from behind the young man (back of his head and shoulder visible in foreground, slightly out of focus), facing the young woman from the character reference. She leans forward slightly across the cafe table with an curious, friendly expression, head tilted inquisitively to one side, eyes bright and engaged. Her hands are clasped together on the wooden table surface. Warm afternoon sunlight creates a soft glow. Coffee cups and cafe items visible on table between them. Blurred cafe interior with plants and pastel decor in background. Warm, inviting atmosphere with shallow depth of field emphasizing her expressive face. Contemporary Korean aesthetic with natural, friendly mood.

Medium-close shot in a modern Korean cafe with soft pastel walls, wooden tables, and warm natural window lighting. The young man from the character reference sits at a cafe table, facing the camera at a slight angle. He has a shy, humble smile and slightly embarrassed expression as he reacts to a compliment, perhaps touching the back of his neck or looking down modestly with a gentle laugh. He wears his casual comfortable clothing. The young woman from the character reference is partially visible in the foreground (side profile or back of her head with her dark hair), seated across from him, creating depth. Warm afternoon light filters through large windows, illuminating cafe plants and coffee cups on their table. The scene captures his youthful, endearing reaction to being told he looks young. Warm, friendly illustrated style with soft pastel colors and natural lighting. Contemporary Korean cafe atmosphere with realistic details.

Wide shot in a modern Korean cafe with soft pastel walls, hanging plants, and warm natural window lighting. The young woman with long dark hair wearing a light-colored top is seated at a wooden cafe table, leaning forward energetically with both hands gesturing expressively as she asks a question, her face bright and curious with raised eyebrows and an engaging smile. Across from her, the young man with dark hair wearing a casual green shirt is shown from a three-quarter angle, sitting back slightly with one hand thoughtfully near his chin, looking contemplative as he considers his answer. Two coffee cups and a small plant centerpiece sit on the wooden table between them. Other cafe details visible in background - chairs, windows, soft bokeh lighting. Warm, friendly illustrated style with soft pastel colors. The scene captures the dynamic energy of an enthusiastic question being asked.

Close-up two-shot in a modern Korean cafe with soft pastel walls and warm natural window lighting. The young woman with long straight black hair and the young man with short black hair and glasses are seated across from each other at a wooden table, both visible from chest up. They are leaning slightly toward each other, both smiling warmly with expressions of genuine interest and connection. The woman holds a coffee cup in her hands, the man has his hands resting on the table. Soft bokeh background shows blurred cafe interior with hanging plants. Warm, friendly illustrated style with soft pastel colors. Natural afternoon lighting creates a cozy, intimate atmosphere. Focus on both characters' faces showing mutual enthusiasm and emerging friendship.

Medium shot in a modern Korean cafe with soft pastel walls, hanging plants, and warm natural window lighting. The young woman with long dark hair wearing a cream cardigan is leaning forward slightly, her hand gesturing toward or lightly touching the young man's shirt sleeve, examining his clothing with an animated, impressed expression and bright smile. The young man with short dark hair wearing a light blue button-up shirt sits with a slightly bashful, pleased smile, looking down at his shirt briefly then back at her. Camera angle is slightly from the side, capturing both their upper bodies and the clothing detail she's commenting on. Warm afternoon sunlight, cozy cafe atmosphere with coffee cups on the wooden table between them. Friendly, playful interaction moment with natural body language. Soft, inviting color palette with warm yellows and pastel tones.

Extreme close-up shot in a modern Korean cafe with soft pastel walls and warm natural window lighting creating a gentle glow. The young woman with long black hair and bangs fills the foreground in sharp focus, her face angled slightly toward the camera with a genuine, warm smile and bright, sparkling eyes showing admiration and delight. Her expression is soft and genuinely complimentary, with natural happiness radiating from her features. In the soft bokeh background, the young man with short black hair and casual clothing is visible but beautifully out of focus, sitting across from her. Warm yellow and cream tones dominate, with dreamy soft-focus cafe details like blurred hanging plants and window light creating lens flares. Shallow depth of field creates an intimate, tender atmosphere. Warm, friendly illustrated style with soft pastel colors and natural lighting. Contemporary Korean young adult aesthetic with approachable, heartfelt mood.

High angle wide shot in a modern Korean cafe with soft pastel walls, wooden floor, hanging plants, and large windows with warm natural sunlight. Camera positioned from elevated diagonal corner perspective looking down at a round wooden table. The young woman with long light brown hair wearing a cream cardigan is leaning forward across the table, both arms extended toward the young man in an inviting friendly gesture, her face bright and hopeful with a warm smile. The young man with dark hair wearing a denim jacket sits across from her, leaning slightly back in his chair with a surprised but happy expression, one hand raised near his chest in a 'who, me?' gesture. The table between them has two coffee cups, small plates with pastries, napkins, and sugar packets. Other cafe tables visible in background with soft bokeh effect. Warm, inviting atmosphere with soft pastel tones, natural window lighting creating gentle shadows. Warm friendly illustrated style with clean contemporary aesthetic.

Low angle shot in a modern Korean cafe looking up at two young people standing together at the counter. The young woman with long dark hair wearing a light cardigan and the young man with short dark hair wearing a beige hoodie are both standing side by side, looking at the menu board above. The cafe counter is visible with an espresso machine, cups, and pastries in a glass display case. Menu boards and pendant lights hang from the ceiling above. Warm natural lighting from windows to the side creates a golden glow. The barista area has wooden counter surfaces and light green subway tiles. Both characters have friendly, engaged expressions as they prepare to order. Shot from below eye level, looking up at approximately 30-degree angle. Soft pastel color palette with warm yellows and light blues. Inviting, friendly atmosphere with depth and realistic cafe details.
